content: this legal text provides a summary of the progress of a legal case regarding the dissolution of a community property between two parties the court has accepted a request made by one party and declared the dissolution of the community resulting from a property purchase the property is located in fontegreca and consists of two properties the court has attributed 50 ownership to one party and ordered the other party to pay a sum of €240725 as an adjustment the court has also exempted the conservator from any responsibility subject to certain conditions the parties initially tried to divide the property amicably but were unsuccessful the court appointed a technical expert to propose a divisional project but no agreement was reached the court then determined that unequal portions could be formed as long as there was a cash adjustment the court ordered one party to pay the other party €240725 as an adjustment the court also ruled that the costs of the litigation and the expert witness would be divided equally between the parties
